nodes.text: The Star Shocked was a nightclub in the city of Gadrin on the planet of Cularin, half-owned by Dexx Molay. It was a two-story structure that had a bar, tables, booths, a stage and large dance floor on the ground level. The second floor was a large balcony, overlooking the dance area below. More tables, booths and a bar were up there, as well as a number of gambling tables. A number of different games of skill were present as well as an area set aside for betting on various events.
